channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Peacemaker’ Episode 8 Finale Theory Shot Down By James Gunn
item.description: Fans have developed a theory about Peacemaker episode 7 heading into episode 8, and James Gunn has stepped in to shut it down already.

item.title: Did Ed Gein Really Help Catch Ted Bundy, Like In The Netflix Show?
item.description: In Monster: The Ed Gein Story on Netflix, it's said that Gein gave the FBI information to catch Ted Bundy. Did that actually happen?

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints Today: Tuesday, October 7 Clues, Answers
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Tuesday, October 7 Clues And Answers (#849)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: The Latest Update On ‘Halo’ Season 3 After Its Netflix Arrival
item.description: Will Halo get a season 3 now that it's on Netflix, and the service could possibly pick up where it left off? Here's the latest update on that.

item.title: The grid

item.title: Status vs. goodness
item.description: It’s easy to come to the conclusion that people with means and high cultural status choose things that are better. Organic vegetables instead of junk ...

item.title: The questions before the questions

item.title: Two kinds of confrontations
item.description: When we win by having someone else lose, we set up a conflict. It’s clear, direct but not generative. But when we win by confronting our fear, everyon...

item.title: Reciprocity
item.description: Our biggest commitments, the things we are most dedicated to, rarely pay us back in equal measure. That might be the point.
